casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alphonzo HARVEY 290A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 9, 2018 Jeffrey William Gillette, Attorney at Law, for Harvey, Alphonzo. Thomas O. Lawton, III, Assistant Attorney General, Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 8th of November 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of November 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 19th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
